description: Take a leisurely stroll in the beautiful Central Park of Cluj-Napoca. Enjoy the greenery, flowers, and peaceful atmosphere. You can also rent a boat and relax on the lake.
wellbeing_impact: Walking in nature has been proven to reduce stress levels, improve mood, and boost overall well-being. It can also help in relaxation and mental clarity.

description: Visit the Botanical Garden for a calm and serene experience surrounded by various plant species. Take a slow walk through the gardens and enjoy the beauty of nature.
budget_breakdown: Cost: 5 RON entrance fee per person
wellbeing_impact: Spending time in a botanical garden can provide a sense of tranquility and connection with nature, which can have a positive impact on mental well-being. It also offers the opportunity for gentle physical activity and relaxation.

description: Explore the Herastrau Park, a large green space with walking paths, trees, and a lake. Take a casual walk around the park, enjoy the fresh air, and maybe have a picnic by the water.
wellbeing_impact: Being in a natural environment like Herastrau Park can improve mood, reduce feelings of anxiety, and promote relaxation. Walking in the park can also help in reducing stress levels and enhancing mental clarity.
